text:
Mrs. Betty McKenzie
Page 3
I m returning the balky items to Henry that he included in his letter,
since they are duplicates of the things yoe nailed ne earlier and I don't
think they should be included in the Kit.
I surely hope I haven't overwhelmed you. . . If you need any more
help from me on this, 1*11 be back September 5.
All the best.
Marion Corweli, Manager
Educational Television
P. S. I'll have the Speaker's Kits ready very soon*
MGslc
lac.
ccs Harold Hill
